ABOUT.TITLE: Created for a fairer and more transparent coexistence.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: SplitEasy was born to eliminate stress and arguments about money at home. Our goal is to offer a simple and powerful tool that promotes financial equity, regardless of income differences, so you can focus on what really matters: enjoying time with the people you love.
ABOUT.BENEFIT_1_TEXT: Distribute expenses according to each person's income.
ABOUT.BENEFIT_2_TEXT: All members see expenses and debts in real time.
ABOUT.BENEFIT_3_TEXT: We calculate who owes whom to avoid uncomfortable conversations.

HERO.TITLE: The easy and fair way to divide expenses at home.
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Forget spreadsheets and arguments. SplitEasy calculates who owes what so your relationship is always transparent.

HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: How does SplitEasy work?
HOW_IT_WORKS.LEAD_TEXT: We have a path for every type of user. Choose your role and discover how easy it is to get started.

REP.STEP_1_TEXT: Create your account in minutes and access it from any device.
REP.STEP_2_TEXT: Add members and define your family or shared group.
REP.STEP_3_TEXT: Define how much each person contributes based on their monthly income.
REP.STEP_4_TEXT: View expenses, balances, and alerts easily.

MEMBER.STEP_1_TEXT: Create your personal account to join a household.
MEMBER.STEP_2_TEXT: Use the invitation code sent to you by the representative.
MEMBER.STEP_3_TEXT: Add the money you earn to the household fund.
MEMBER.STEP_4_TEXT: Review all transactions and the balance transparently.

MEMBER.HEADER: If you are a member of the household
MEMBER.SIGNUP_TEXT: Create your account with your email or favorite social network.
MEMBER.JOIN_TEXT: Enter the household ID provided by your representative.
MEMBER.INCOME_TEXT: Declare your monthly income to automatically calculate your contribution.
MEMBER.MONITOR_TEXT: Check your contributions and stay on top of your financial responsibilities.
